name: Time Off (VintageBiscuits)
description:
my first 3D game, and the first time I've used Godot, made for the 112th Mini jam

working a 9 - eternity job is tough, but you can make it go by much faster, while your boss isn't looking rush up and move your clock up, get it all the way around and escape purgatory to ascend to the next life, get caught and be lost forever.

while changing the time make sure to peak out of your cubicle to make sure the boss isn't to close to you

CONTROLS:

space:  change camera from desk to clock view

shift: while looking at your clock press shift to adjust the clocks hands

control: while looking at the clock press control to peak out of your cubicle to see how far away your boss is

note the html version may have some hiccups, to avoid that download the executable
